game_description: This is COMIXV EDITION Package for Romance Fantasy. You can experience 6 webtoons about sweet love and sorrow fantasy. · Romance Fantasy Pack LIST · <Tears, the glare>, <Golden Dokkaebi Cubee- Wish of a mysterious butterfly>, <Love Monorail>, <The Wizard Living Next Door>, <See you in Baa Dream>, <4542>
review_1: I think this app is very cute. There’s not a lot of stories on it but they’re all sweet RomCom types. The only problem I have is the format. The panels are extremely close to the viewer and the background is blindingly white so it’s a little painful to look at for a long time. But that might just be a personal issue. Besides that it’s pretty great
